reviewText: A well acted movie by all including David Caruso--he did a good job on this movie--great plot --kept me interested.  He was a great actor before his Miami TV series--always looking for movies he did--this one is rare--get it if you can find it.
great movie always like david caruso
Great Movie for any David Caruso Fan
I'm a big David Caruso fan, and this movie was one of his best, Thrilling from beginning to end!
It was a great movie.  David Caruso was fantastic, he played his part with such greatness.  I am so glad I bought this movie
Great movie thrilling, suspense, one of my favorites to add to my collection. The acting was very good an great story line.
If you like David Caruso you will see him at his best in this intense drama.  Ned's desire for justice is well placed when the father of the convicted killer takes the jury hostage.
Charles S. Dutton, in an awesome feature, belief in his son's innocents that he holds the juror's hostage till they see the truth.
